cards.column_description: unique id number identifying the cards
The name of the artist that illustrated the card art.
ascii Name; The ASCII(opens new window) (Basic/128) code formatted card name with no special unicode characters.
A list of the card's available printing types.
cards.value_description: arena, dreamcast, mtgo, paper, shandalar

cards.column_description: border Color; The color of the card border.
cards.value_description: black, borderless, gold, silver, white

cards.column_description: card Kingdom Foil Id
cards.value_description: commonsense evidence: cardKingdomFoilId, when paired with cardKingdomId that is not Null, is incredibly powerful.

cards.column_description: card Kingdom Id
cards.value_description: A list of all the colors in the color indicator

cards.column_description: color Identity; A list of all the colors found in manaCost, colorIndicator, and text
color Indicator; A list of all the colors in the color indicator (The symbol prefixed to a card's types).
A list of all the colors in manaCost and colorIndicator.
cards.value_description: Some cards may not have values, such as cards with Devoid in its text.

cards.column_description: converted Mana Cost; The converted mana cost of the card. Use the manaValue property.
cards.value_description: if value is higher, it means that this card cost more converted mana

cards.column_description: duel Deck; The indicator for which duel deck the card is in.
rec Rank in edh; The card rank on EDHRec
face Converted Mana Cost; The converted mana cost or mana value for the face for either half or part of the card.
cards.value_description: if value is higher, it means that this card cost more converted mana for the face

cards.column_description: face Name; The name on the face of the card.
flavor Name; The promotional card name printed above the true card name on special cards that has no game function.
cards.value_description: The promotional card name printed above the true card name on special cards that has no game function.

cards.column_description: flavor Text; The italicized text found below the rules text that has no game function.
cards.value_description: The italicized text found below the rules text that has no game function.

cards.column_description: frame Effects; The visual frame effects.
cards.value_description: colorshifted, companion, compasslanddfc, devoid, draft, etched, extendedart, fullart, inverted, legendary, lesson, miracle, mooneldrazidfc, nyxtouched, originpwdfc, showcase, snow, sunmoondfc, textless, tombstone, waxingandwaningmoondfc

cards.column_description: frame Version; The version of the card frame style.
The starting maximum hand size total modifier.
cards.value_description: A + or - character precedes an integer. commonsense evidence: positive maximum hand size: +1, +2, .... negative maximum hand size: -1, .... neural maximum hand size: 0....

cards.column_description: has Alternative Deck Limit; If the card allows a value other than 4 copies in a deck.
cards.value_description: 0: disallow 1: allow

cards.column_description: has Content Warning; If the card marked by Wizards of the Coast (opens new window) for having sensitive content. See this official article (opens new window) for more information.
cards.value_description: 0: doesn't have 1: has sensitve content or Wizards of the Coast commonsense evidence: Cards with this property may have missing or degraded properties and values.

cards.column_description: has Foil; If the card can be found in foil
cards.value_description: 0: cannot be found 1: can be found

cards.column_description: has Non Foil; If the card can be found in non-foil
cards.value_description: 0: cannot be found 1: can be found

cards.column_description: is Alternative; If the card is an alternate variation to an original printing
cards.value_description: 0: is not 1: is

cards.column_description: is Full Art; If the card has full artwork.
cards.value_description: 0: doesn't have, 1: has full artwork

cards.column_description: is Online Only; If the card is only available in online game variations.
cards.value_description: 0: is not 1: is

cards.column_description: is Oversized; If the card is oversized.
cards.value_description: 0: is not 1: is

cards.column_description: is Promotion; If the card is a promotional printing.
cards.value_description: 0: is not 1: is

cards.column_description: is Reprint; If the card has been reprinted.
cards.value_description: 0: has not 1: has not been

cards.column_description: is Reserved; If the card is on the Magic: The Gathering Reserved List (opens new window)
cards.value_description: If the card is on the Magic, it will appear in The Gathering Reserved List

cards.column_description: is Starter; If the card is found in a starter deck such as Planeswalker/Brawl decks.
cards.value_description: 0: is not 1: is

cards.column_description: is Story Spotlight; If the card is a Story Spotlight card.
cards.value_description: 0: is not 1: is

cards.column_description: is Text less; If the card does not have a text box.
cards.value_description: commonsense evidence: 0: has a text box; 1: doesn't have a text box;

cards.column_description: is Time shifted; If the card is time shifted
cards.value_description: commonsense evidence: If the card is timeshifted, a feature of certain sets where a card will have a different frameVersion.

cards.column_description: A list of keywords found on the card.
The type of card layout. For a token card, this will be "token"
leadership Skills; A list of formats the card is legal to be a commander in
The starting life total modifier. A plus or minus character precedes an integer.
The starting loyalty value of the card.
cards.value_description: Used only on cards with Planeswalker in its types. empty means unkown

cards.column_description: mana Cost; The mana cost of the card wrapped in brackets for each value.
cards.value_description: commonsense evidence: manaCost is unconverted mana cost

cards.column_description: The name of the card.
cards.value_description: Cards with multiple faces, like Split and Meld cards are given a delimiter.

cards.column_description: The number of the card
original Release Date
cards.value_description: The original release date in ISO 8601(opens new window) format for a promotional card printed outside of a cycle window, such as Secret Lair Drop promotions.

cards.column_description: original Text
cards.value_description: The text on the card as originally printed.

cards.column_description: original Type
cards.value_description: The type of the card as originally printed. Includes any supertypes and subtypes.

cards.column_description: other Face Ids
cards.value_description: A list of card UUID's to this card's counterparts, such as transformed or melded faces.

cards.column_description: The power of the card.
cards.value_description: commonsense evidence: ∞ means infinite power null or * refers to unknown power

cards.column_description: A list of set printing codes the card was printed in, formatted in uppercase.
promo Types; A list of promotional types for a card.

cards.column_description: purchase Urls; Links that navigate to websites where the card can be purchased.
The card printing rarity.
Set Code; The set printing code that the card is from.
The identifier of the card side.
cards.value_description: Used on cards with multiple faces on the same card. commonsense evidence: if this value is empty, then it means this card doesn't have multiple faces on the same card.

cards.column_description: A list of card subtypes found after em-dash.
super types; A list of card supertypes found before em-dash.
cards.value_description: commonsense evidence: list of all types should be the union of subtypes and supertypes

The rules text of the card.
The toughness of the card.
The type of the card as visible, including any supertypes and subtypes.

cards.column_description: A list of all card types of the card, including Un‑sets and gameplay variants.
The universal unique identifier (v5) generated by MTGJSON. Each entry is unique.
The name of the watermark on the card.

foreign_data.column_description: unique id number identifying this row of data
flavor Text; The foreign flavor text of the card.
The foreign multiverse identifier of the card.
The foreign name of the card.
The foreign text ruling of the card.
The foreign type of the card. Includes any supertypes and subtypes.

legalities.value_description: each value refers to different rules to play

sets.column_description: unique id identifying this set
base Set Size; The number of cards in the set.
The block name the set was in.
A breakdown of possibilities and weights of cards in a booster pack.
The set code for the set.
is Foil Only; If the set is only available in foil.
is Foreign Only; If the set is available only outside the United States of America.
is Non Foil Only; If the set is only available in non-foil.
is Online Only; If the set is only available in online game variations.
is Partial Preview; If the set is still in preview (spoiled). Preview sets do not have complete data.
keyrune Code; The matching Keyrune code for set image icons.
magic card market id; The Magic Card Marketset identifier.
magic card market ID Extras; The split Magic Card Market set identifier if a set is printed in two sets. This identifier represents the second set's identifier.
magic card market name
magic the gathering online code; The set code for the set as it appears on Magic: The Gathering Online
sets.value_description: commonsense evidence: if the value is null or empty, then it doesn't appear on Magic: The Gathering Online

sets.column_description: The name of the set.
parent Code; The parent set code for set variations like promotions, guild kits, etc.
release Date; The release date in ISO 8601 format for the set.
tcg player Group Id; The group identifier of the set on TCGplayer
total Set Size; The total number of cards in the set, including promotional and related supplemental products but excluding Alchemy modifications - however those cards are included in the set itself.
The expansion type of the set.

set_translations.column_description: set code; the set code for this set
